StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Kids First: Genomic Studies of Orofacial Cleft Birth Defects

Person.Organization: UNIVERSITY OF TEXAS HLTH SCI CTR HOUSTON

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The results analyzed and <published or shown> here are based in whole or in part upon data generated by Gabriella Miller Kids First Pediatric Research Program projects <insert phs accession number(s)>, and were accessed from the Kids First Data Resource Portal (https://kidsfirstdrc.org/) and/or dbGaP (www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap).
Policy.ic_specific_access_term:
Data use limitations vary by consent group and are as follows: 1) General Health Research, 2) Orofacial birth defects and related phenotypes, 3) Orofacial birth defects only, or 4) Oral clefts only. Data use for a given consent group must be consistent with the described data use limitations.
Methodological research to improve knowledge of how genetic factors play a role in the etiology of oral clefts (or other conditions, depending on the data use limitations) is permitted for these datasets.
The progress report should specifically cite work done that relates to this dataset, "Kids First: Genomic Studies of Orofacial Cleft Birth Defects", and not just a generic report for a series of datasets that may have been requested.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Orofacial birth defects and related phenotypes, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OBDR-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Orofacial birth defects and related phenotypes. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
Includes related diseases and phenotypes such as medical and dental data, speech characteristics, images and derived data (e.g. 3D facial measures, ultrasounds of the upper lip), and all other physical assessments taken on the study subjects.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Orofacial birth defects, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OBD-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Orofacial birth defects. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Oral Clefts, PUB, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OC-PUB-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Oral Clefts. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.
